pageSize.tooBig: pageSize should be less or equal to 2147483647.

pageIndex.negative: pageIndex should be equal to -1 or greater than 0
pageIndex.tooBig: pageIndex should be less or equal to 2147483647.

sortOrder.invalid: sortOrder should be an element of asc,desc.

sortColumn.invalidColumn: sortColumn should be an element of id,type,placement,prize,numcontestants,numsubmissions,codingduration.
sortColumn.invalidColumn2: sortColumn should be an element of id,type,placement,prize,num_contestants,num_submitters,coding_duration.
